definition: variant of 迴避|回避[hui2 bi4]
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: Deciding on the application of challenge.
sentences.chinese: 關於申請回避的審查決定。

sentences.english: Kennicott slowly understood that she meant to keep up her seclusion .
sentences.chinese: 肯尼科特慢慢地開始懂得，她是有意要回避他。

sentences.english: Deflect or evade the sensitive ones.
sentences.chinese: 轉移或者回避敏感話題。

sentences.english: This question should not be dodged.
And why do the development and environmental groups shy away from it?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一衆發展和環保團體都回避這個問題？

sentences.english: I apply dodge on the picture of which the texturing stage is over with after merging the layers.
sentences.chinese: 申請回避的圖片，其中紋理階段是合併後的同層。

sentences.english: The young men saw me, and hid themselves: and the aged arose, and stood up.
sentences.chinese: 少年人見我而回避，老年人也起身站立。

sentences.english: Oftentimes, we tend to avoid problems because of the discomfort and awkwardness it feels.
sentences.chinese: 我們常常因爲困難帶來的不適和不愉快而回避它。

sentences.english: She has also threatened to impose a minimum wage on more industries where collective agreements are being side-stepped.
sentences.chinese: 她還揚言要對更多回避集體協議的產業設定最低工資。

sentences.english: The problem is staring us in the face.
sentences.chinese: 問題是明擺的，我們想回避也迴避不了。

sentences.english: If there is someone or something in your life that drains you emotionally, avoid it.
sentences.chinese: 如果生活中有某人或某事會將你的情感耗盡，請回避。

sentences.english: But the author evades the main point.
The documents refer to a "defensive strategy" based on "categorical denial".
sentences.chinese: 文件將這一回避性的否認稱之爲‘防衛策略’。

sentences.english: He tried to fence off the consequences of his foolish act.
sentences.chinese: 他想回避他那愚蠢行爲的後果。

sentences.english: Where a case undertaker is under any of the foresaid circumstances, he shall apply for the withdrawal in a voluntary manner.
sentences.chinese: 案件承辦人具有上述情形之一的，應當自行申請回避。

sentences.english: Do not avoid or postpone tasks and activities.
sentences.chinese: 不要回避或者延緩任務或者活動。

definition: to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to hide/to evade/to dodge/to take shelter/to avoid (difficulties)
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
